name: posref
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))

stmt.origin: sylan(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2), wbr(c1, c3, c1), wcel(c0, cproset))
stmt.pretty: sylan(c0 ∈ Poset, c1 ∈ c2, c1[c3]c1, c0 ∈ Proset)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c0, cproset))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Poset → c0 ∈ Proset)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Proset ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c0, cproset))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ Poset → c0 ∈ Proset)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Proset ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)
⊣ ((c0 ∈ Proset ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cproset), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Proset ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(le ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cpo), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(c1, c3, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c3, cfv(cple, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Poset ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c1[c3]c1)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c0)
⊣ c3 =(le ` c0)

comment: A poset ordering is reflexive. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2011.) (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 25-Mar-2020.)
